description: ScheduleManager - Page loads without errors and displays existing events
steps: Step 1: Navigate to /schedule page
Step 2: Wait for page to fully load
Step 3: Verify page renders without console errors
Step 4: Verify events timeline is visible if events exist

description: ScheduleManager - Create new event functionality works
steps: Step 1: Navigate to /schedule page
Step 2: Click 'Add Event' button
Step 3: Fill in event title 'Test Practice'
Step 4: Select event type 'PRACTICE'
Step 5: Set date to tomorrow
Step 6: Set time to '19:00'
Step 7: Fill in location 'Test Location'
Step 8: Click 'Save Event' button
Step 9: Verify new event appears in timeline
Step 10: Verify event displays correct title, date, time, and location

description: ScheduleManager - Edit event functionality works
steps: Step 1: Navigate to /schedule page with existing events
Step 2: Hover over an event card to reveal edit button
Step 3: Click edit button on an event
Step 4: Verify form populates with existing event data
Step 5: Change event title to 'Updated Event'
Step 6: Click 'Update Event' button
Step 7: Verify event displays updated title

description: ScheduleManager - Delete event functionality works
steps: Step 1: Navigate to /schedule page with existing events
Step 2: Note the number of events displayed
Step 3: Click delete button on an event
Step 4: Verify confirmation dialog appears
Step 5: Click 'Delete' to confirm
Step 6: Verify event is removed from timeline
Step 7: Verify event count decreased by one
